ing: 6 ounces canned mackerel fillets in oil
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste (optional)
des: "This quick and easy mackerel spread is easy to whip up in a hurry and serve as a starter or as a party dip with crusty bread or crackers."
ins: Drain mackerel and place in a large bowl. Add eggs, onion, mayonnaise, parsley, and black pepper; mix well to combine.
